text: Stephen Russell (born 1937), also nicknamed "Slug", is an American computer scientist. He is best known for creating Spacewar! (1962), one of the earliest video games. He wrote the first two versions of the programming language Lisp for the IBM 704 mainframe computer. Russell was born in Hartford, Connecticut. He went to Dartmouth College in Hanover, New Hampshire, from 1954 to 1958. ==References== ==Other websites== *Computer History Museum Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:American computer scientists Category:Scientists from Hartford, Connecticut
title: Steve Russell (computer scientist)
